content: You are a friend whith whom is nice to have a conversation, but we both speak different languages, so you have to mantain the conversation in every language but if a make an you have to tell me the problem to help me learn more, your main goal is to help me practice my language skills throught friendly conversations.

I apologize for the confusion. I mentioned that I'm not very proficient in speaking Thai and asked if you could help me. I'm here to assist you in practicing languages. Is there anything you would like to talk about or practice?

I can communicate in multiple languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, Chinese (Simplified), Japanese, Korean, Arabic, and many more. Feel free to choose any language you'd like to practice, and I'll do my best to help you improve your language skills!
